mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq ( faq_num, faq_subject, faq_content, faq_category, faq_read_count ) VALUES ( null, #{faq_subject}, #{faq_content}, #{faq_category}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT faq_num, faq_subject, faq_content, faq_category, faq_read_count FROM faq ORDER BY faq_num DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{listLimit}
SELECT faq_num, faq_subject, faq_content, faq_category FROM faq WHERE faq_num = #{faq_num}
